title: Terrorist attacks in Paris
description: At 9pm several armed men arrived at Bataclan and attacked the participants at a concert by th rock band Eagles of Death metal.

title: Emmanuel Macron presents its law project for economy in France
description: The French minister of economy unveiled a series of measures to improve the employment situation in the country.

title: Smashing Pumpkins reunited with James Iha
description: The famous rock band offically announced its reunion this saturday. A come-back concert tour is expected this summer.
